statements: SELECT * FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_contacts WHERE campaign_source = 'Online';
SELECT contact_number, customer_name FROM customer_contacts WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customer_contacts WHERE campaign_source = 'Referral' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_contacts;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_contacts WHERE campaign_source = 'Online';
SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM customer_contacts ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT email_address FROM customer_contacts WHERE campaign_source = 'Referral' ORDER BY email_address DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, contact_number, campaign_source FROM customer_contacts WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%' OR email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT campaign_name, location FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_date DESC, campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT id, name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_date, location FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers INNER JOIN marketing_campaigns ON customers.id = marketing_campaigns.id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, notes FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_id, interaction_date FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interactions.campaign_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM marketing_team ORDER BY team_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_details FROM contact_history ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM marketing_team WHERE team_size > 5 ORDER BY team_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerContacts;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CustomerContacts ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT id, response_date, response FROM CampaignResponses WHERE response_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM CampaignInteractions WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CustomerContacts WHERE campaign_source = 'Digital Marketing' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT c.id, cc.first_name, cc.last_name, cr.response, cr.response_date FROM CampaignResponses cr JOIN CustomerContacts cc ON cr.customer_id = cc.id JOIN Campaigns c ON cr.campaign_id = c.id WHERE cr.response_date >= '2021-01-01';

SELECT ci.interaction_date, cc.first_name, cc.last_name, ci.interaction_type, c.campaign_name FROM CampaignInteractions ci JOIN CustomerContacts cc ON ci.customer_id = cc.id JOIN Campaigns c ON ci.campaign_id = c.id WHERE ci.interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY ci.interaction_date DESC;
SELECT cc.first_name, cc.last_name, cn.note, cn.note_date FROM ContactNotes cn JOIN CustomerContacts cc ON cn.customer_id = cc.id WHERE cc.email LIKE '%@example.com%';
